name: flappy bird ultra
description:
Flappy Bird Ultra is a casual game where you can control a bird to fly and dodge attacks. You can adjust your own limits in the endless mode after passing through the levels.

Smooth flying experience

Seamless 2D and 3D integration

Steam achievements

Diverse gameplay, even includes cross-dimensional scenes

Enjoyable gaming experience



Default controls:
WASD for movement
Number keys 1 and 2 for using items
You can purchase items in the store."
